name: A Forgotten Silkroad
description:
A Forgotten Silkroad

As the Internet era continues to shines,
new "silkroads" appear all around the world.

Thousands of miles of pipes and cables lies in the deep ocean,
connecting billions of people.
Among these massive networks, some dark
and forgotten roads remain unexplored.

Can you find your way out of the forgotten silkoad ?

Overview

This is a simple roguelike platformer.

You need to find your way out a succession of rooms.

Each rooms are full of enemies. When all enemies of a room are defeated, you'll gain damage of armor bonuses.

If you die, you'll restart from the beginning and you'll lose all your bonuses.

Controls KeyMoveArrow left/right
Move left/right
Arrow up
JumpXAttack Status

Buggy as hell, jam submission, you know the drill

The HTML version does not have music (since the music file was pretty heavy).

Credits

Used this tutorial from Furcifer for shader basic. Applied this to make a flash effect when the player or enemies take damages.

Used some sounds from the game Dota 2 (Valve Subscriber Agreement).

Reused a music I made for the Composing Jam Pastime II.
